page.title: 04MEMORIES OF OLD DOVER
page.content:
(TRANSCRIPT OF TAPED REMINISENCES.)
YOUR GREAT GRANDAD WAS A BUILDER OF 3 MASTED SHIPS.THEY WERE USED FOR MERCHANDISE.THEY TOOK GOODS THAT WERE MADE IN DOVER AND SOLD IT IN DIFFERENT TOWNS.HE WAS ALSO A FISHERMAN IN HIS SPARE TIME.HE USED TO GO IN THE CHANNEL AND FISH.HE WOULD GO ABROAD TO BUY DIAMONDS AND RUBIES,CLEAN AND GUT THE FISH AND PUT THE GEMS IN THE FISH TO SMUGGLE INTO DOVER.WHEN THEY CAME ASHORE SOMEBODY WOULD BUY THEM.HE MADE A LOT OF MONEY. YOUR GREAT GRANDAD AND SOME OTHER MEN INVESTED MONEY AND BOUGHT A SHOP IN RIVER AND TURNED IT INTO THE FIRST CO-OP IN DOVER.HIS SON WAS A STOREMAN THERE.HE HAD A HORSE AND CART AND HE DELIVERED THE BREAD AND VEGETABLES.THEY HAD OIL LAMPS.
